To taste a beer, you must appreciate 4 fundamental variables
Another variable we add in DeCatas is the bottle.
To analyze the appearance of a beer you can watch:

• Color: Yellow, caramel, copper, black...

• Tonality: Thick, translucent...

• Foam: Is it dense?, lasts?

• Gasification: Beer gas is alive or barely noticeable

• Malt notes: Caramel, cereal, licorize, coffee,...

• Beer hops notes: Herbal, floral, citrus,...

" The smell depends on the type, quantity and proportion of malt and hops used in the production, as well as other elements that are added after fermentation to give other types of organoleptic qualities. So you should be aware of:"

• Malts flavors: Earthy, chocolate,...

• Hops flavors: Fruity, flowery, resinous,...

For the flavor, we recommend that you enjoy a first sip that caresses the entire palate. You will notice there the first qualities of the beer, in the next one you will confirm them or discover new ones. As in the olfactory phase, when tasting beer, the flavors that you will notice depend on both the hops and the malt, or the fruits, spices, ... that are added to the beer.

You should write down the sensations that the beer has left on the palate. Not all beers, no matter how similar they are in many of their characteristics, leave the same appreciation. There are more carbonated beers, others are acidic, others bitter, others are dense, ... That is why you should appreciate:

"• Texture: Light, dense,...

• Vivacity: A lot or little gasification.

• Predominance: Sour, bitter, sweet,...
"
Finally, to evaluate the bottle you can look at its shape, the design of the labels, its colors and shapes,...
Final Degree Project for the Higher Technical School of Computer Engineering 2019/2020
How do I create a new beer tasting?
How do I register beer ratings?
What is the average of a beer?
How are the results of a beer tasting calculated?

To create a beer tasting you have to go to New Beer Tasting from the user\'s home page. Next, you are asked to give the beer tasting a name and a password. This password will be used by other users to enter the tasting. The administrator of the beer tasting will be adding the names of the beers to value.
To rate a beer individually you have to go to Nueva Cerveza from the user\'s home page. In this way, you can add ratings without creating a specific beer tasting.
The average of a beer is calculated from its different evaluations of its attributes. Each attribute counts the same for the mean so an arithmetic mean is used.

To calculate the best average beer, the average mark of each beer is calculated for each person in the tasting. If the average mark of these previous scoes is calculated, the general average mark of the beer is obtained. The \"Best Average Beers\" table shows these averages ordered from highest to lowest.

To calculate the best beer according to the attribute, the average rating of all the people for that attribute is calculated. The table \"Best beers by smell / appearance / etc.\" shows these means ordered from highest to lowest

For the calculation of the best judge of average, the general average of the beer is subtracted for each person and each beer from the individual average valued by the person. This difference accumulates. The best judge on average is the person with the least accumulated difference.

To calculate the best judge by attribute, the general average of the beer for that attribute is subtracted for each person and each beer from the person\'s assessment for that attribute. This difference accumulates. The best judge according to the attribute is the person with the least accumulated difference.
Username has to be 8 characters maximum

Password must:

• Have between 6 and 20 character

• Have at least one number

• Have at least one lowercase letter

• Have at least one capital letter
